amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the International Boundary and Water Commission between the United States and Mexico by $500,000 and decreases funding for State Department Diplomatic and Consular Programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce by $500,000 funds for Diplomatic and Consular programs of the State Department and to increase by $500,000 the account for State Department construction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilbray amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
